txt.en: The Host of the West has many fine wares for those who would aid them.
'Excellent. Our business is concluded for now.'
Enhancement Runes for Host of the West Silver Pieces (Daily)
'I have some special inventory on offer. If you bring me 50 Host of the West Silver pieces, I will give you Enhancement Runes. I can offer you this deal once a day at most.'
'The special merchandise I offer is rare indeed, so you understand that I cannot offer you a discount. Return with the 50 tokens I asked for and we can make a deal.'
The Host of the West Quartermaster asked you to bring them fifty Host of the West Silver Pieces.
Deliver 50 Host of the West Silver Pieces to the Host of the West Quartermaster
